page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT:WILBERLEE AREA
page.content: In our survey we asked people how often they visit the cinema or go to the theatre to see a live show.Most people had not been to either in the last year.Around 20% said that they occasionally go,often taking a child, but only 4% go regularly. When asked what they did at night when they went out,almost 35% said they visit friends,30% go to a public house,15% go out for a meal,10% do other things,while 10% don't go out. On Sunday,they visit friends or relatives,go for a walk or a car ride, watch T.V.or simply relax;in that order of preference. We noted some changes in how people enjoy themselves today compared with fifty years ago;but many similarities. Dancing,visiting local parks and going to the cinema have declined.Eating out and sporting activies have increased.
